functional_units.name: smhd Box Parser
functional_units.description: Parses the smhd media header box and exposes normalized sound metadata such as balance, graphics mode, and opcolor.

functional_units.name: vmhd Box Parser
functional_units.description: Parses the vmhd media header box and exposes normalized video metadata such as graphics mode and opcolor.

functional_units.name: BoxParserRegistry Extension
functional_units.description: Registers the smhd and vmhd parsers so they can be resolved by the registry.

functional_units.name: JSONParseTreeExporter Update
functional_units.description: Exports parsed boxes into a JSON structure, including the new sound/video metadata fields.

functional_units.name: Structured Payload Encoder Update
functional_units.description: Encodes typed payload models for smhd and vmhd into structured data for CLI snapshots and DocC consumers.

functional_units.name: DocC Integration Notes Update
functional_units.description: Provides documentation on how to surface the media header details in DocC.
